lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What happened when God sent a great wind on the earth?
answers: The water began to go down
The ark started spinning in circles
Lightning struck the ark
All the animals fell asleep for many days

questions.text: Where did the ark come to rest?
answers: On a mountain
In a deep valley
On the Tower of Babel
On top of a giant tree

questions.text: Why did Noah send out a raven and a dove?
answers: To see if there was any dry land
To find new animals to bring into the ark
To test how strong the wind was
To send a message to other people

questions.text: When Noah released the dove the first time, what happened?
answers: It flew around and came back
It stayed on the ark and refused to leave
It landed on a mountain and never returned
It brought back a feather from another bird

questions.text: When Noah released the dove a second time, what happened?
answers: It returned with a branch in its beak
It disappeared into the clouds
It flew back frightened and empty-beaked
It returned with a stone from a mountain

questions.text: When Noah released the dove a third time, what happened? What did that tell Noah?
answers: It didn’t return; Noah knew there was dry land
It circled the ark three times and landed again
It returned with a fish in its beak
It went for a swim

questions.text: What did Noah build after leaving the ark?
answers: An altar to burn a sacrifice to the Lord God
A giant tower to reach the heavens
A new house for his family
A fence to keep the animals together

questions.text: What did God tell Noah’s family to do?
answers: Have lots of children and fill the earth
Stay on the mountain forever
Build cities
Turn the ark into a house

questions.text: What covenant did God make with Noah?
answers: To never flood the entire earth again
To give Noah riches and long life
To hide pots of gold at the ends of all rainbows
To stop all storms forever

questions.text: What did God give as a sign to Noah that He would always remember his covenant?
answers: A rainbow
A shining star in the daytime
A cloud shaped like an ark
A talking dove
